result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Corey L. Piper
Current: 176430 County Hwy II, Apt 1, Hatley, WI 54539 United States  (Effective: 10-03-2022)
Prior: 1031 6Th Avenue, Antigo, WI 54409

1:32 PM Defendant Corey L. Piper in court.  Attorney Elizabeth Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Atty. Robert Kennedy Jr. in court for Corey L. Piper. Atty Kennedy notes 22TR349 is tracking along, waives reading and waives time limits for P.H. Atty. Kennedy notes Def. wishes to modify bond. Court also calls 22TR349. Def. waives time limits for P.H. Court accepts waiver of time limits for P.H. Court acknowledges bond modification and cannot review today, as modification needs to be seen by Judge with a written motion. Atty Kennedy requests to appear via zoom for next status conference. Court approves and advises Atty Kennedy to get bond modification request in writing and schedule with Judge's JA.  Bond continues.
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:52 PM Defendant Corey L. Piper in court.  Attorney Kelly L Hays in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Court reviews case history. Def. has contacted Atty. State heard on Atty warning. Court advises and grants adjournment. CC notes after hearing that 22tr349 will track along.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court calls 22CF132 & 22TR349 @ 2:08 PM Defendant Corey L. Piper in court.  Attorney Elizabeth Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. 22TR349 should be City of Antigo not State of WI. State advise it is a  State of WI ticket and Atty Imig should be removed.  Court review history of case.  Def. heard on counsel.  Def. made no contact for attorney.  Def. should have atty retainer within 1 month. No victim rights. Court adjourns, Def. heard on bond modification. CC has not seen written bond modification. Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:31 PM Defendant Corey L. Piper in court.  Attorney Kelly L Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews history of case. Def. would like 60 days to retain atty. Court will adjourn. Bond continues.  Def. heard on no contact provision.  State objects to lift no contact provision.  Court reviews. Court heard on conditions.  Court will not modify bond.  Def. may submit written motion.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Maintain Absolute Sobriety. No illegal use or possession of controlled substances No driving a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. No presence in establishments with Class B liquor license. No contact with Chelsea Noel.

4:20 PM Defendant Corey L. Piper appeared by phone, in custody.  Attorney Kelly L Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options, PD, hire own or court appointed atty.  State gives bail/bond recommendation. Def. makes statement.  Court orders $3,000 cash bond, Maintain Absolute Sobriety. No presence in establishments with Class B liquor license. No driving a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. No illegal use or possession of controlled substances. No contact with Chelsea Noel.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
